programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: An extramarital affair turns fatal.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A new reward is offered in the nine-year-old case of a missing honeymooner.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.sub-title: Live to Tell: The Birthday Party
programme.desc: A federal prosecutor, kidnapped at gunpoint on his birthday, recounts his bizarre hostage ordeal.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: The investigation into the shooting death of retired NYPD officer Patrick Gilhuley, including interviews with jury members and a deconstruction of forensic evidence.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: In 1969, 15-year-old John McCabe excitedly left for a dance at a neighborhood hall; the discovery of his body in an abandoned lot launched an investigation that lasted 40 years and would turn childhood friends into bitter enemies.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: Small-town plumber John Cataneo fixes other people's homes for a living, until death came knocking on his front door; to find out who wanted him dead, police investigate the contents of Cataneo's own home, and get the leak they need.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: When a well-respected psychiatrist and his adult son are killed as they sleep, police are baffled by the apparent randomness until an arrest in an unrelated crime leads them to the least likely of suspects.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: In Livermore, California, a love triangle sets two women on a collision course; a couple rekindles romance by visiting to a picturesque region of Michigan, but only one of them is coming home.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: In Maryland, a real body turns up after a murder mystery dinner; in Adelaide, South Australia, a love rival winds up dead.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: In New Port Richey, Florida, a sex party has a gruesome ending; on the outskirts of London, England, farmyard animals could hold the key to what's happened to a missing wife.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: In Denver, Colorado, a mistress plots revenge when she's dumped; in a small community north of Stockholm, Sweden, a deeply religious woman believes she's receiving messages from God - to kill.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: In Chicago, Illinois, a millionaire meets an exotic dancer with a secret agenda; in Marion, Ohio, friends suspect the worst when a wife and mother goes missing.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: An internet love triangle leads to deception and murder near Buffalo, New York; on the outskirts of London, England, a romantic stroll through the woods ends with a brutal attack.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: A teenager and a middle-aged man rob and try to murder another man and his 80-year-old mother.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: Two masked bandits rob armored-car couriers at Las Vegas casinos.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: The FBI at first suspects a woman's husband in her disappearance.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: A man robs Wells Fargo Bank in Albuquerque, N.M., on Aug. 10, 1999, claiming the money would be used to feed poor Mexican children.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: A man kills three coffee-shop employees.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: On Aug. 12, 1997, a man wearing a stocking mask, gloves and a baseball hat robs Norwest Bank in Scottsdale, Ariz.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: When an officer dies in the line of duty, the fraternity of law enforcement bands together to make sure that justice is brought to those responsible.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: When a man arrives at the home of his mother, he realizes the car parked in front has a broken window. After he enters the house he finds the lifeless body of his mother.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: Police dogs, helicopters and hundreds of volunteers participate in the search for an abducted child.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: A millionaire's teenage daughter is kidnapped for ransom.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: When a 14-year-old runaway is found dead in an Illinois barn, agents track down a trucker who might be responsible for her death and dozens more.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: It takes investigators two years to track down the gunmen who stole $18.9 million from an armored-truck depot in Los Angeles.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: A serial killer calls and taunts a victim's family.

programme.title: The FBI Files
